description: Our trendy and comfortable sugar hill one bedroom apartment is only one block away from the subway and only minutes to Times Square. It comfortably fits two and makes you feel at home. This beautiful apartment also includes a gorgeous outdoor private balcony and gives you access to parks and lots of stores!
name: Modern city Apartment W/ balcony
review: Prévoyez vos couverts. Sinon le reste était parfait.
